content: this is a very popular easy-to-knit little baby cardigan jacket great for a new baby - boy or girl knitted top-down with a garter stitch yoke a simple and elegant design add cute buttons for a contemporary look sizes newborn 3 months 6 - 9 months 9 - 12 months preemie sizes also available requirements dk 8ply yarn 4mm needles 3 or 6 buttons **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓** the original pattern was for a 3 button version and - due to popular demand i have now added a fully-buttoned version too matching hat and booties are also available if you wish to make a little set a lovely gender-neutral design
